title: Prime-Line S 4049 5/16 inch Bolt Throw Steel Brass-Plated Mailbox Lock with Offset Keyway
features: Fits on older style apartment mailboxes
Key cannot be removed in unlocked position which prevents accidental unlocked boxes
Lock body features a 3/16 in. offset keyway with centered bolt throw
5/16 in. bolt throw provides secure engagement
Easy to replace keyed locking hardware
description: This brass plated mailbox lock is constructed of steel and fits on mailboxes manufactured by Bommer. It features a heavy duty 5/16" bolt throw with a 3/16" offset keyway. The key to this mailbox lock can only be removed when in locked position.

This mailbox lock comes plated in brass. It features a 5/16 in. bolt throw and a 3/16 in. offset keyway. It is designed so that your key cannot be removed while in the unlocked position. This style lock fits old style apartment mail boxes.
